title: Fear
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Is this a joke that no one's laughin' at?
Throwin' good energy after bad
Take the credit and then fade to black
I guess this time it's goin' outside
[Pre-Chorus]
You take the beating they give
But you didn't do anything criminal
They live in a bubble that nothing can penetrate
Never allowing to slip at all
You're only human, they bleed just like you do
And you're not immune to their ridicule
If they have a thought, don't mean that it's right
Because they said out loud now
[Chorus]
Fear is a joykiller, so fuck what they say
No winnеr, lost spirit from words on our page
They only say you can't do when thеy can't do it
Don't let it get to you, babe
Fear is a joykiller, so fuck what they say
[Verse 2]
Don't let the dark around us get to you
You were born incredible and free
A wise one can argue or respect a fool
From far away, it's difficult who you see

[Pre-Chorus]
You keep your mouth shut
Head down tryin' to deal with all the subliminals
Avoid any trouble, don't give in to the hate
You cannot play by their hidden rules
You're only human, they bleed just like you do
And you're not immune to their ridicule
If they have a thought, don't mean that it's right
Because they said out loud now
[Chorus]
Fear is a joykiller, so fuck what they say
No winner, lost spirit from words on our page
They only say you can't do when they can't do it
Don't let it get to you, babe
Fear is a joykiller, so fuck what they say
[Post-Chorus]
Ooh
So fuck what they say
Ooh
[Chorus]
Fear is a joykiller, so fuck what they say
No winner, lost spirit from words on our page
They only say you can't do when they can't do it
Don't let it get to you, babe
Fear is a joykiller, so fuck what they say

[Post-Chorus]
Ooh
So fuck what they say
Ooh, ooh
So fuck what they say
Ooh
